Description: This corpus contains Tweets. The corpus is morphosyntactically tagged following the MULTEXT-East Version 4 tagset.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancers KonText and noSketchEngine and for download from the CLARIN.SI repository.
This corpus contains legal texts.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordance KonText, the PML-TQ tool and for download from the LINDAT repository.

Annotation: mark-up of discourse phenomena enriched by the annotation of secondary connectives
Description: This corpus is a subset of the Prague Dependency Treebank 3.5.#SEPThe corpus is available through the PML-TQ tool.

This corpus is an extended version of Prague Czech-English Dependency Treebank 2.0, with added mark-up of coreference. The syntactic parsing follows the PDT 2.0 styleD#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the LINDAT repository. The version without coreference annotation is available through the concordancer KonText and the PML-TQ tool.T 2.0 style.
The syntactic parsing follows the Universal Dependencies schema.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the LINDAT repository.

Annotation: linked data (places, persons, bible citations, etc.)
Description: This corpus contains the literary works of the Danish bishop N.F.S Grundtvig.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the CLARIN-DK repository.
This is a manually annotated subset of the much larger (approx.. 500 million) word) SoNaR corpus.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Dutch Language Institute.
This corpus contains 6818 terms extracted from abstracts of computational linguistics papers.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from LINDAT and through KonText.

Corpus: Speech, Thought and Writing Presentation Corpus
Description: This corpus contains literary, newspaper and biography texts.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Oxford Text Archive.

Corpus: TimeML annotated corpus of Estonian newspaper articles
Description: This corpus contains newspaper articles.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from META-SHARE (CELR distribution).

Corpus: Estonian Treebank annotated with coreference relations
Description: This corpus contains newspaper texts plus one scientific medical text.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from META-SHARE (CELR distribution).
The corpus is available for download from META-SHARE (CELR distribution).
In addition to coreference, the corpus is annotated for identity and bridging relations.#SEPIn addition to coreference, the corpus is annotated for identity and bridging relations.
This corpus contains texts from the domains of politics, law and travel.#SEPThis corpus is available for download from the clarin:el repository.

Corpus: KPWr (Polish Corpus of Wrocław University of Technology) 1.2

This corpus is available for download from the ZIL IPI PAN repository.

Corpus: Annotated corpora and tools of the PARSEME Shared Task on Automatic Identification of Verbal Multiword Expressions (edition 1.1)
Annotation: identification of verbal multi-word expressions (idioms, light-verb constructions, verb-particle constructions, inherently reflexive verbs, multi-verb constructions)
